title: Legacy: Olympic National Park
creator_credit: United States. National Park Service and United States. Dept. of the Interior
brief_description: Situated in the extreme north-west of Washington State, the Olympic National Park provides a variety of sea and animal life in an untamed, unspoiled wilderness. This film surveys the park from its dense forests and high country to its sea border and cold coastal waters.
creator_credit_for_label: United States. National Park Service and United States. Dept. of the Interior
